about_the_game:
Welcome to Deep in The Fear, an intense and chilling experience that will take you and your friends on a plunge into the depths of fear. This 5-PLAYER CO-OP horror game offers a sinister and immersive journey where survival depends on collaboration and the courage of all.

Synopsis


Embark on a dark adventure that challenges the limits of human courage. Deep in The Fear immerses players in a nightmare where dark mysteries and unimaginable horrors await in the unknown depths. An ancient evil has resurfaced, and only by working together can you and your friends have a chance to unravel the dark secrets and escape alive.

Key Features


CO-OP FOR 5 PLAYERS: Join your friends to face the unknown. Collaboration is the key to surviving the terrors lurking in the shadows.

Dive into the Depths of Fear: Explore eerie and atmospheric environments, each with its own challenges and mysteries. Every decision matters, and danger lurks around every corner.

Interactive Nightmares: Solve complex puzzles, avoid terrifying creatures, and uncover disturbing secrets as you try to escape the collective nightmare.

Chilling Atmosphere: The immersive soundtrack and stunning visuals combine to create a terror experience that will make your heart race.

Prepare for a journey that will test your nerves and the strength of your friendship. In Deep in The Fear, darkness hides indescribable horrors, and only the most fearless will survive. Are you ready to face the fear together? Venture into the depths of terror now!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4570
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760 TI or another graphics card with 4gb vram
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-8400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 570 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Dive into heart-pounding terror with our CO-OP horror experience for 5 PLAYERS. Uncover chilling mysteries, face unspeakable horrors, and survive together in this intense collaborative nightmare. Will your team escape the shadows, or succumb to the darkness that lurks within?
